name: KidneyXRay
title: Kidney X Ray
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: These terms may be used when reporting a result associated with Kidney X-ray or may be used to represent the procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify Kidney X-ray performed or resulted on a patient or identify patients who have had Kidney X-ray performed or resulted.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes specific to Kidney X-ray tests.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes Kidney X-ray codes that are precoordinated with body sites other than the kidney.)

contains.display: XR Kidney - bilateral 3 Serial Views WO and W contrast IV
XR Kidney - bilateral Views W contrast IV
XR Kidney Limited Views W contrast IV
XR Kidney Views W contrast IV
XR Kidney Views W contrast antegrade
XR Kidney Views W contrast antegrade via pyelostomy
XR Kidney Views W contrast retrograde
XR Kidney Views during surgery W contrast retrograde
